definition: Zhu De (1886-1976), communist leader and founder of the People's Liberation Army
Zhu Yuanzhang, personal name of first Ming dynasty emperor Hongwu 洪武[Hong2 wu3]
Ken Zhu (1979-), Taiwanese singer and actor
Vermilion Bird (the seven mansions of the south sky)
Zhu Xi or Chu Hsi (1130-1200), also known as Master Zhu 朱子, Song dynasty Confucian writer and propagandist, founder of neo-Confucianism
cinnabar/mercuric sulfide HgS/also written 硃砂|朱砂[zhu1 sha1]
cinnabar/mercuric sulfide HgS/also written 硃砂|朱砂[zhu1 sha1]
Zhu Di, personal name of third Ming Emperor Yongle 永樂|永乐[Yong3 le4]

sentences.english: Eight heavy think of is also, adopted the zhu ban shan suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 八重想想也是，采纳了朱半山的建议。

sentences.english: You don't have to bite my head off. I'm just quoting Julia.
sentences.chinese: 你不需要冲我发火，我不过是在引用朱莉娅的话。

sentences.english: Its coloration media use liquid ink.
sentences.chinese: 其不隐色介质均搁置固体不朱。

sentences.english: Mr Ball has just called on Ms Zhu to give her a message.
sentences.chinese: 鲍尔先生刚刚来拜访朱女士，带给她一个口信。

sentences.english: To be able to trust and be so supportive of a man, Madam Chu is indeed a very generous woman.
sentences.chinese: 能如此信任与支持一个男人，朱女士真的是很大方。

sentences.english: The autumn of vegetable didn't know at mother to descend there how much time, get her to like preferably.
sentences.chinese: 素秋不知在朱嬷嬷那里下了多少工夫，颇得她的喜欢。

sentences.english: Cheng give it to G, G put it in the briefcase.
sentences.chinese: 郑小心翼翼地递给朱，朱把它装进公文包。

sentences.english: Cheng give it to G, G put it in the briefcase.
sentences.chinese: 郑小心翼翼地递给朱，朱把它装进公文包。

sentences.english: Zhu is being held without bond at the Montgomery County Jail.
sentences.chinese: 朱海洋正被关押于蒙哥马利县监狱，并不得保释。

sentences.english: Julia scowled at her jeweled tortoise .
sentences.chinese: 这时朱莉娅怒视着那只嵌着钻石的乌龟。

sentences.english: Julia and her friends had a fascinated abhorrence of what they called "pont street" .
sentences.chinese: 朱莉娅和她的朋友们非常憎恨所谓的“庞特街”。

sentences.english: Finally, Zhu Pingkang won the first prize in the styling contest of motorboats with a score of 4297.
sentences.chinese: 最终，朱平康以4297分夺得摩托艇花样赛一等奖。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhu was charged with first-degree murder and was being held at the Montgomery County Jail.
sentences.chinese: 朱海洋被控一级谋杀目前被押于蒙哥马利郡监狱。

sentences.english: Whatever the re might be, " said Jukes, "we are steaming straight into it".
sentences.chinese: “不管是什么，”朱克斯说，我们都要径直行驶进去。

sentences.english: Yulan's father, Zhu Daji, agrees to sell his ancestral house to the government.
sentences.chinese: 玉兰的父亲朱大吉见钱眼开，竟将祖屋授权给政府。

definition: surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
